name: misdiagnosis
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a decision that a person has a particular illness or condition, when in fact they have a different one: His wife claims the hospital made a misdiagnosis. Doctors must take steps to confirm test results and avoid misdiagnosis.
More examplesFewer examplesIt's a common misdiagnosis.A focus on the abdomen alone can easily lead to misdiagnosis and incorrect treatment.An initial misdiagnosis of dementia is particularly common in elderly patients where symptoms involved a steady decline in overall mental function
